archimate:BusinessObject.name: Public Service Agent
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: An EIRA ABB that represents a participant involved in the delivery or consumption of a public service. Public Service Agents are can be citizens, businesses, organisations, or systems.

properties.value: An EIRA ABB that represents a participant involved in the delivery or consumption of a public service. Public Service Agents are can be citizens, businesses, organisations, or systems.
